description:
Gao tries to help Bal regain his senses while also battling Doctor Gara. Doctor Gara reveals that he can block Final Phase as well as Impact Monsters. As Gao reminds Bal of their promise to become Buddy Champions, he unlocks a new power within himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gao! This is the Dragon Force!
Gaoo! Kore ga Dragon Force Da!!
ガオオォ! これがドラゴンフォースだ!!
